Package com.google.gwt.gears.client.localserver

Manually managed offline support for the Google Gears API for GWT.

See:
          Description

Interface Summary
ManagedResourceStoreCompleteHandler Provides an interface to implement in order to receive update complete events.
ManagedResourceStoreErrorHandler Provides an interface to implement in order to receive update error events.
ManagedResourceStoreProgressHandler Provides an interface to implement in order to receive progress events.
ResourceStoreUrlCaptureHandler Provides an interface to implement in order to receive capture events.
 

Class Summary
FileSubmitter The FileSubmitter object facilitates the submission of local files, that were previously captured using ResourceStore.captureFile(Element, String), in multipart/form-data encoded form submissions.
LocalServer A factory and container for the set of ResourceStores and ManagedResourceStores your application creates and uses.
ManagedResourceStore Manages a collection of URLs that are updated atomically, as a group.
ManagedResourceStoreCompleteHandler.ManagedResourceStoreCompleteEvent Encapsulates the arguments to the update complete event.
ManagedResourceStoreErrorHandler.ManagedResourceStoreErrorEvent Encapsulates the arguments to the update error event.
ManagedResourceStoreProgressHandler.ManagedResourceStoreProgressEvent Encapsulates the arguments to the progress event.
ResourceStore Manages an ad-hoc collection of captured URLs, which can be served locally.
ResourceStoreUrlCaptureHandler.ResourceStoreUrlCaptureEvent Encapsulates the arguments to the capture event.
 

Package com.google.gwt.gears.client.localserver Description

Manually managed offline support for the Google Gears API for GWT.

These classes allow the programmer to specify and manage the files kept locally. For automated offline support, see the Offline class and the GWT module Offline.gwt.xml.
